TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlDependency extends System.Object

summary.span: 物件表示應用程式與 SQL Server 執行個體之間的查詢告知相依性。

span.span: The object represents a query notification dependency between an application and an instance of SQL Server.

summary.span: 應用程式可以建立 物件，並註冊為透過 事件處理常式接收告知。

span.span: An application can create a object and register to receive notifications via the event handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 很適合用於快取的案例，其中您的 ASP.NET 應用程式或中介層服務必須保留在記憶體中快取的特定資訊。 is ideal for caching scenarios, where your ASP.NET application or middle-tier service needs to keep certain information cached in memory. 可讓您在資料庫中的原始資料變更，以便可以重新整理快取時接收通知。 allows you to receive notifications when the original data in the database changes so that the cache can be refreshed. 若要設定相依性時，您需要建立關聯物件至一或多個物件。To set up a dependency, you need to associate a object to one or more objects. 若要接收通知，您必須訂閱事件。To receive notifications, you need to subscribe to the event. 如需有關建立查詢通知需求的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用查詢通知](/sql/relational-databases/native-client/features/working-with-query-notifications)。For more information about the requirements for creating queries for notifications, see [Working with Query Notifications](/sql/relational-databases/native-client/features/working-with-query-notifications). > [!NOTE] > 用意是要用於 ASP.NET 或中介層服務沒有相對較少的伺服器中針對資料庫使用中的相依性。 was designed to be used in ASP.NET or middle-tier services where there is a relatively small number of servers having dependencies active against the database. 它已不會針對用戶端應用程式，其中會有數百或數千個用戶端電腦所設計為單一資料庫伺服器設定的物件。It was not designed for use in client applications, where hundreds or thousands of client computers would have objects set up for a single database server. 如果您正在開發應用程式的資料變更時，會需要可靠的次秒通知，請檢閱章節[規劃有效率的查詢通知策略](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/sql/sql-server-2008-r2/ms187528(v=sql.105)#planning-an-efficient-query-notifications-strategy)和[替代項目查詢通知](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/sql/sql-server-2008-r2/ms187528(v=sql.105)#alternatives-to-query-notifications)中[通知計畫](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/sql/sql-server-2008-r2/ms187528(v%3dsql.105))文章。If you are developing an application where you need reliable sub-second notifications when data changes, review the sections [Planning an Efficient Query Notifications Strategy](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/sql/sql-server-2008-r2/ms187528(v=sql.105)#planning-an-efficient-query-notifications-strategy) and [Alternatives to Query Notifications](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/sql/sql-server-2008-r2/ms187528(v=sql.105)#alternatives-to-query-notifications) in the [Planning for Notifications](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/sql/sql-server-2008-r2/ms187528(v%3dsql.105)) article. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [SQL Server 中的查詢通知](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/query-notifications-in-sql-server.md)並[建置通知解決方案](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/sql/sql-server-2005/ms171065(v%3dsql.90))。For more information, see [Query Notifications in SQL Server](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/query-notifications-in-sql-server.md) and [Building Notification Solutions](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/sql/sql-server-2005/ms171065(v%3dsql.90)). > [!NOTE] > 事件可能會產生不同的執行緒，從起始命令執行的執行緒上。The event may be generated on a different thread from the thread that initiated command execution. 查詢通知僅支援符合特定需求清單的 SELECT 陳述式。Query notifications are supported only for SELECT statements that meet a list of specific requirements.

summary.span: 建立 類別的新執行個體。

summary.span: 以預設設定建立 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class with the default settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式初始化物件使用預設 Service Broker 服務名稱和逾時。在建構之後某個時間點，您必須使用方法來建立關聯的一或多個命令，這個物件。The constructor initializes the object using the default Service Broker service name and time-out. At some point after construction, you must use the method to associate one or more commands to this object. 查詢通知僅支援符合特定需求清單的 SELECT 陳述式。Query notifications are supported only for SELECT statements that meet a list of specific requirements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [SQL Server Service Broker](/sql/database-engine/configure-windows/sql-server-service-broker)並[使用查詢通知](/sql/connect/oledb/features/working-with-query-notifications)。For more information, see [SQL Server Service Broker](/sql/database-engine/configure-windows/sql-server-service-broker) and [Working with Query Notifications](/sql/connect/oledb/features/working-with-query-notifications).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就內部而言，這個建構函式建立的執行個體類別，並繫結至物件。Internally, this constructor creates an instance of the class, and binds it to a object. 查詢通知僅支援符合特定需求清單的 SELECT 陳述式。Query notifications are supported only for SELECT statements that meet a list of specific requirements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [SQL Server Service Broker](/sql/database-engine/configure-windows/sql-server-service-broker)並[使用查詢通知](/sql/connect/oledb/features/working-with-query-notifications)。For more information, see [SQL Server Service Broker](/sql/database-engine/configure-windows/sql-server-service-broker) and [Working with Query Notifications](/sql/connect/oledb/features/working-with-query-notifications).

MemberSignature.Value: public bool HasChanges { get; }
.property instance bool HasChanges
Public ReadOnly Property HasChanges As Boolean
public: property bool HasChanges { bool get(); };
member this.HasChanges : bool

summary.span: 取得值，指出與相依性相關的其中一個結果集是否已變更。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether one of the result sets associated with the dependency has changed.

value.span: 布林值，指出其中一個結果集是否已變更。

span.span: A Boolean value indicating whether one of the result sets has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您不使用事件，您可以檢查屬性來判斷是否已變更的查詢結果。If you are not using the event, you can check the property to determine if the query results have changed. 屬性不一定表示資料的變更。The property does not necessarily imply a change in the data. 其他情況下，例如逾時過期，而且無法設定通知要求，也會產生變更事件。Other circumstances, such as time-out expired and failure to set the notification request, also generate a change event.

span.span: A string representation of a GUID that is generated for each instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來唯一識別指定執行個體。The property is used to uniquely identify a given instance.

summary.span: 接收到與這個 物件相關的任何命令之告知時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a notification is received for any of the commands associated with this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當相關聯的命令的結果變更時，就會發生。 occurs when the results for the associated command change. 如果您不使用，您可以檢查屬性來判斷是否已變更的查詢結果。If you are not using , you can check the property to determine whether the query results have changed. 事件不一定表示資料的變更。The event does not necessarily imply a change in the data. 其他情況，例如逾時到期，而且無法設定通知要求，也會產生。Other circumstances, such as time-out expired and failure to set the notification request, also generate .

summary.span: 啟動接聽程式，以接收相依性變更告知。

span.span: Starts the listener for receiving dependency change notifications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SQL Server 連接中發生錯誤時，將會重新啟動接聽程式。The listener will restart when an error occurs in the SQL Server connection. 多次呼叫方法可以進行下列限制：Multiple calls to the method can be made, subject to the following restrictions: - 以相同的參數 （相同的連接字串和呼叫的執行緒中的 Windows 認證） 的多個呼叫都有效。Multiple calls with identical parameters (the same connection string and Windows credentials in the calling thread) are valid. - 使用不同的連接字串的多個呼叫都有效，只要：Multiple calls with different connection strings are valid as long as: - 每個連接字串會指定不同的資料庫，或Each connection string specifies a different database, or - 每個連接字串會指定不同的使用者，或Each connection string specifies a different user, or - 呼叫會來自於不同的應用程式定義域。The calls come from different application domains. 您可以讓正確地使用多個執行緒來代表不同的使用者認證，而不需要提供給群組，dbo 角色，因為不同的使用者可以訂閱，並接聽的應用程式 (使用或)由系統管理員建立的通知佇列。You can make the work correctly for applications that use multiple threads to represent different user credentials without giving the dbo role to the group, because different users can subscribe and listen (using or ) to a notification queue created by an administrator. 相關的應用程式定義域啟動時，呼叫具有初始化服務/佇列 （CREATE QUEUE 和 CREATE SERVICE 權限的資料庫） 的權限的使用者認證 (Windows) 開始。When the relevant application domain starts, call Start with the (Windows) credentials of a user that has permission to initialize a service/queue (the CREATE QUEUE and CREATE SERVICE permissions for the database). 請確定每個 AppDomain，否則為模稜兩可時引發例外狀況之後才會呼叫開始。Ensure that Start is only called once per AppDomain, otherwise an ambiguity exception is raised. 使用者執行緒必須具有訂閱通知 （資料庫的 SUBSCRIBE QUERY NOTIFICATIONS 權限） 的權限。The user thread must have permission to subscribe to the notification (the SUBSCRIBE QUERY NOTIFICATIONS permission for the database). 會建立關聯的訂用帳戶要求系統管理員所建立的服務/佇列的非系統管理員使用者。 will associate the subscription request of a non-administrator user to the service/queue created by the administrator.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool Start (string connectionString);
.method public static hidebysig bool Start(string connectionString) cil managed
Public Shared Function Start (connectionString As String) As Boolean
public: static bool Start(System::String ^ connectionString);
static member Start : string -> bool

param.name: connectionString
param.span: 連接字串，其指定從中取得變更告知的 SQL Server 執行個體。

span.span: The connection string for the instance of SQL Server from which to obtain change notifications.

summary.span: 啟動接聽程式，從連接字串所指定的 SQL Server 執行個體接收相依性變更告知。

span.span: Starts the listener for receiving dependency change notifications from the instance of SQL Server specified by the connection string.

returns.span: 如果接聽程式成功初始化，則為 **true**，如果相容的接聽程式已存在，則為 **false**。

span.span: **true** if the listener initialized successfully; **false** if a compatible listener already exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法會啟動的接聽程式從所指定的 SQL Server 執行個體接收相依性通知`connectionString`參數。This method starts the listener for the for receiving dependency notifications from the instance of SQL Server specified by the `connectionString` parameter. 呼叫這個方法可能會超過一次使用不同的連接字串的多部伺服器。This method may be called more than once with different connection strings for multiple servers. 如需其他備註中，請參閱。For additional remarks, see .

exception.span: 參數為 NULL。

span.span: The parameter is NULL.

exception.span: 參數和這個方法的前一個呼叫相同，但參數不同。

span.span: The parameter is the same as a previous call to this method, but the parameters are different.

exception.span: 方法從 CLR 中呼叫。

span.span: The method was called from within the CLR.

exception.span: 呼叫端沒有必要的 程式碼存取安全性 (CAS) 使用權限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required code access security (CAS) permission.

exception.span: 後續的方法呼叫使用對等 參數，但使用者不同或使用者未預設為相同結構描述。

span.span: A subsequent call to the method has been made with an equivalent parameter with a different user, or a user that does not default to the same schema.

exception.span: 此外，也會發生任何基礎 **SqlClient** 例外狀況。

span.span: Also, any underlying **SqlClient** exceptions.

Public Shared Function Start (connectionString As String, queue As String) As Boolean
public: static bool Start(System::String ^ connectionString, System::String ^ queue);
static member Start : string * string -> bool

param.name: connectionString
param.span: 連接字串，其指定從中取得變更告知的 SQL Server 執行個體。

span.span: The connection string for the instance of SQL Server from which to obtain change notifications.

param.name: queue
param.span: 所要使用的現有 SQL Server Service Broker 佇列。

span.span: An existing SQL Server Service Broker queue to be used.

param.span: 如果是 ，就會使用預設的佇列。

span.span: If , the default queue is used.

summary.span: 啟動接聽程式，從連接字串所指定的 SQL Server 執行個體並使用指定的 SQL Server Service Broker 佇列，接收相依性變更告知。

span.span: Starts the listener for receiving dependency change notifications from the instance of SQL Server specified by the connection string using the specified SQL Server Service Broker queue.

returns.span: 如果接聽程式成功初始化，則為 **true**，如果相容的接聽程式已存在，則為 **false**。

span.span: **true** if the listener initialized successfully; **false** if a compatible listener already exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法會啟動的接聽程式從所指定的 SQL Server 執行個體接收相依性通知`connectionString`參數。This method starts the listener for the for receiving dependency notifications from the instance of SQL Server specified by the `connectionString` parameter. 呼叫這個方法可能會超過一次使用不同的連接字串的多部伺服器。This method may be called more than once with different connection strings for multiple servers. 如果未不指定任何佇列名稱，則暫存佇列和服務的伺服器中建立用於整個程序中，即使處理程序牽涉到多個。If no queue name is specified, creates a temporary queue and service in the server that is used for the entire process, even if the process involves more than one . 佇列和服務會自動移除在應用程式關閉時。The queue and service are automatically removed upon application shutdown. 如需其他備註中，請參閱。For additional remarks, see .

span.span: The parameter is the same as a previous call to this method, but the parameters are different.

span.span: The method was called from within the CLR.

span.span: Also, any underlying **SqlClient** exceptions.

summary.span: 停止在前一個 呼叫中指定之連接的接聽程式。

span.span: Stops a listener for a connection specified in a previous call.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SQL Server 連接中發生錯誤時，將會重新啟動接聽程式。The listener will restart when an error occurs in the SQL Server connection.

param.name: connectionString
param.span: 連接字串，其指定前一個 呼叫中所使用的 SQL Server 執行個體。

span.span: Connection string for the instance of SQL Server that was used in a previous call.

summary.span: 停止在前一個 呼叫中指定之連接的接聽程式。

span.span: Stops a listener for a connection specified in a previous call.

returns.span: 如果接聽程式已完全停止，則為 **true**，如果有 從接聽程式解除繫結，但至少有另一個 正在使用相同接聽程式時，則為 **false**。

span.span: **true** if the listener was completely stopped; **false** if the was unbound from the listener, but there are is at least one other using the same listener.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法必須呼叫每個呼叫。The method must be called for each call. 指定的接聽程式只會關閉完全當它收到相同的數目做為要求要求。A given listener only shuts down fully when it receives the same number of requests as requests.

exception.span: 發生基礎 **SqlClient** 例外狀況。

span.span: An underlying **SqlClient** exception occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool Stop (string connectionString, string queue);
.method public static hidebysig bool Stop(string connectionString, string queue) cil managed
Public Shared Function Stop (connectionString As String, queue As String) As Boolean
public: static bool Stop(System::String ^ connectionString, System::String ^ queue);
static member Stop : string * string -> bool

param.name: connectionString
param.span: 連接字串，其指定前一個 呼叫中所使用的 SQL Server 執行個體。

span.span: Connection string for the instance of SQL Server that was used in a previous call.

param.name: queue
param.span: 在前一個 呼叫中所使用的 SQL Server Service Broker 佇列。

span.span: The SQL Server Service Broker queue that was used in a previous call.

summary.span: 停止在前一個 呼叫中指定之連接的接聽程式。

span.span: Stops a listener for a connection specified in a previous call.

returns.span: 如果接聽程式已完全停止，則為 **true**，如果有 從接聽程式解除繫結，但至少有另一個 正在使用相同接聽程式時，則為 **false**。

span.span: **true** if the listener was completely stopped; **false** if the was unbound from the listener, but there is at least one other using the same listener.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法必須呼叫每個呼叫。The method must be called for each call. 指定的接聽程式只會關閉完全當它收到相同的數目做為要求要求。A given listener only shuts down fully when it receives the same number of requests as requests.

exception.span: 參數為 NULL。

span.span: The parameter is NULL.

exception.span: 方法從 SQLCLR 中呼叫。

span.span: The method was called from within SQLCLR.

exception.span: 呼叫端沒有必要的 程式碼存取安全性 (CAS) 使用權限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required code access security (CAS) permission.

exception.span: 且發生基礎 **SqlClient** 例外狀況。

span.span: And underlying **SqlClient** exception occurred.
